import React from 'react'; function AboutUs() { return (
{/* Image Section */}

About Us

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed sit amet nulla auctor, vestibulum magna sed, convallis ex.

Aims and Objectives

    The aims and objectives of the association are:

  • To preach the Gospel of Our Lord Jesus Christ.
  • To preach the good news about redemption through Our Lord Jesus Christ.
  • To equip Christians for works of service, encouraging spiritual growth and helping them to recognise and develop their God-Given gift through the teaching of the bible, the Ministry of the Holy Spirit and worship.
  • To train and ordain Ministers of the gospel for the purpose of spreading the gospel. To provide instructions and fellowship for believers, seeking to build them up the measure and stature of the fullness of Christ (Eph 4:13).
  • To glorify the Lord Jesus Christ-The Head of the Church.
  • To proclaim the Gospel of the Lord Jesus Christ as revealed in the scriptures and to encourage and support the proclamation of the Gospel in accordarice with Matthew 28:18-20 to the ends of the earth.
); } export default AboutUs;
